Plot: Dr. Ellie Arroway, after years of searching, finds conclusive radio proof of extraterrestrial intelligence, sending plans for a mysterious machine.
Writer: James V. Hart (screenplay by), Michael Goldenberg (screenplay by), Carl Sagan (based on the novel by), Carl Sagan (based on the story by), Ann Druyan (based on the story by)
Actors: Jena Malone, David Morse, Jodie Foster, Geoffrey Blake
Awards: Nominated for 1 Oscar. Another 14 wins & 26 nominations.
Title: Contact
